pins.description: M76xxsim Project uses following Beaglebone black pins available through expansion headers P8 and P9.
pins.comment: Omitted beaglebone used pins by default.

header.label: lcd_rs
header.description: Connected to the LCD Register Select output.

header.label: lcd_en
header.description: Connected to the LCD Enable Signal output.

header.label: lcd_d4
header.description: Connected to the LCD Data bit 7 output.

header.label: lcd_d5
header.description: Connected to the LCD Data bit 6 output.

header.label: lcd_d6
header.description: Connected to the LCD Data bit 5 output.

header.label: lcd_d7
header.description: Connected to the LCD Data bit 4 output.

header.label: gpio23
header.description: NOT USED.

header.label: close_pha
header.description: Connected to the M-76xx Output 2. Input circuit and debounce time provided by B-1713 Actuator board.

header.label: trip_pha
header.description: Connected to the M-76xx Output 1. Input circuit and debounce time provided by B-1713 Actuator board.

header.label: close_phb
header.description: Connected to the M-76xx Output 6. Input circuit and debounce time provided by B-1713 Actuator board.

header.label: trip_phb
header.description: Connected to the M-76xx Output 5. Input circuit and debounce time provided by B-1713 Actuator board.

header.label: close_phc
header.description: Connected to the M-76xx Output 8. Input circuit and debounce time provided by B-1713 Actuator board.

header.label: trip_phc
header.description: Connected to the M-76xx Output 7. Input circuit and debounce time provided by B-1713 Actuator board.

header.label: gpio61
header.description: NOT USED.

header.label: gpio86
header.description: NOT USED.

header.label: phs_a_cls(sw2)
header.description: Connected to the B-1431, M-6283A Single Pole Three Phase Adapter signal name PHS_A_CLS.

header.label: phs_b_cls(sw2)
header.description: Connected to the B-1431, M-6283A Single Pole Three Phase Adapter signal name PHS_B_CLS.

header.label: phs_c_cls(sw2)
header.description: Connected to the B-1431, M-6283A Single Pole Three Phase Adapter signal name PHS_C_CLS.

header.label: pha_52a
header.description: Connected to the M-76xx Input 1 return.

header.label: phb_52a
header.description: Connected to the M-76xx Input 6 return.

header.label: phc_52a
header.description: Connected to the M-76xx Input 8 return.

header.label: neu_gnd_cls(sw2)
header.description: Connected to the B-1431 #2, M-6283A Single Pole Three Phase Adapter signal name PHS_C_CLS.

header.label: gpio48
header.description: NOT USED. Default voltage = 1.6Vdc.

header.label: gpio51
header.description: NOT USED.

header.label: gpio5
header.description: NOT USED.

header.label: gpio4
header.description: NOT USED.

header.description: NOT USED.

header.label: gpio2
header.description: NOT USED.

header.label: gpio49
header.description: NOT USED.

header.label: gpio15
header.description: NOT USED.

header.label: neu_gnd_opn(sw1)
header.description: Connected to the B-1431 #2, M-6283A Single Pole Three Phase Adapter signal name PHS_C_OPN.

header.label: gpio14
header.description: NOT USED. Default voltage = 1.2Vdc.

header.label: pha_52b
header.description: Connected to the M-76xx Input 2 return.

header.label: phb_52b
header.description: Connected to the M-76xx Input 7 return.

header.label: phc_52b
header.description: Connected to the M-76xx Input 9 return.

header.label: phs_a_opn(sw1)
header.description: Connected to the B-1431, M-6283A Single Pole Three Phase Adapter signal name PHS_A_OPN.

header.label: phs_b_opn(sw1)
header.description: Connected to the B-1431, M-6283A Single Pole Three Phase Adapter signal name PHS_B_OPN.

header.description: Connected to the B-1431, M-6283A Single Pole Three Phase Adapter signal name PHS_C_OPN.
